# Note: order is important as some projects might be interdependent
foreach(dir
  pybind11
  ambit
  chemps2
  cppe
  dkh
  libefp
  erd
  gau2grid
  gdma
  libint
  mdi
  pcmsolver
  pylibefp
  qcelemental
  qcengine
  simint
  libxc
  xtl
  xsimd
  xtensor
  xtensor-blas
  xtensor-python
  )
  add_subdirectory(${dir})
endforeach()
